target.name: help
target.description: Displays all demo targets
target.echo: Demo specific targets:
run-SimpleEditor Shows a graph editor which demonstrates the editing features of yFiles for JavaFX.
run-OrgChart View and manipulate an organization chart.
run-RotatableNodes Shows how support for rotated node visualizations can be implemented on top of the yFiles library.
run-CollapsibleTree Interactively collapse and expand subgraphs.
run-LogicGate An editor for networks of logic gates with dedicated ports for incoming and outgoing connections.
run-BpmnEditor Create and edit Business Process Diagrams.
run-HierarchicGrouping Organize subgraphs in groups and folders and interactively expand and collapse them.
run-TableEditor Interactive editing of tables using TableEditorInputMode.
run-LayoutStyles Play with the most used layout algorithms of yFiles.
run-HierarchicLayout Showcase of one of our central layout algorithms, the HierarchicLayout.
run-InteractiveOrganicLayout Use InteractiveOrganicLayout for organic layout in interactive environments.
run-PartitionGrid Demonstrates the usage of a PartitionGrid for hierarchic and organic layout calculations.
run-CustomPortModel Customize port location model.
run-ContextMenu Create a context menu for graph items and manage it.
run-CustomSnapping This demo shows how to customize SnapLine behaviour.
run-DragAndDrop Shows the drag and drop support provided by yFiles for JavaFX.
run-EdgeReconnectionPortCandidateProvider Demo code that shows how to customize the reconnection behavior for existing edges.
run-OrthogonalEdges Customize orthogonal edge editing.
run-PortCandidateProvider Customize the ports at which edges connect to nodes.
run-PositionHandler Demo code that shows how to customize the movement behavior of INodes.
run-ReparentHandler Demo code that shows how to customize the reparent gesture in a IGroupedGraph.
run-ReshapeHandleProvider Demo code that shows how to customize the resize behavior of INodes.
run-SingleSelection Configure the GraphEditorInputMode for single selection mode.
run-SizeConstraintProvider Demo code that shows how to customize the resizing behavior of INodes.
run-SwingDemo Demo application that shows how to integrate yFiles for JavaFX in a Swing application.
run-Css Shows the possibilities to customize the visualizations in yFiles for JavaFX with the help of CSS.
run-EdgeToEdge Shows edge-to-edge connections.
run-GraphEvents Explore the different kinds of events dispatched by yFiles for JavaFX.
run-GraphMLCompatibility Shows how to enable read compatibility for GraphML files from older versions.
run-GraphViewer A viewer which demonstrates different kinds of graphs created with yFiles for JavaFX.
run-ImageExport Export a graph as a bitmap image.
run-LargeGraphs Improve the rendering performance for very large graphs in yFiles for JavaFX.
run-Printing Print the contents of a yFiles GraphControl.
run-RenderingOrder Shows the effect of different rendering policies to the model items.
run-RichTextLabelStyle Using the JavaFX 8 Rich Text API in yFiles.
run-SimpleCustomStyle Shows how to implement sophisticated styles for graph objects in yFiles for JavaFX.
run-TemplateStyle Shows how to use TemplateNodeStyle and TemplateLabelStyle to create complex node and label visualizations using FXML components.
run-GraphBuilder Demonstrates data binding using the GraphBuilder class.
run-InteractiveNodesGraphBuilder Demonstrates data binding using class AdjacentNodesGraphBuilder.
run-GraphAnalysis Algorithms to analyse the structure of a graph in yFiles for Java (Swing).
run-ShortestPath Usage and visualization of shortest path algorithms in yFiles for JavaFX.
run-ObfuscationDemo Demonstrates the obfuscation of an yFiles for JavaFX application via yGuard.
run-SVGImageExport Demonstrates image export to SVG files. Requires a batik.jar and the JFXConverter library. See the file src-svg/viewer/svgimageexport/build.xml for details.
run-SwtDemo Demonstrates the interoperability with SWT. Requires a swt.jar. See the file src-swt/integration/swt/build.xml for details.
General targets:
touch touches all demo .java files
clean removes all that has been built
compile compiles the demo packages
